name: Daisy & The Tower Of Dreams
description:
A demo for an in-development Super Mario Bros fangame called Daisy & The Tower Of Dreams!

Peach has been cursed into an eternal slumber! Now Daisy must traverse Peach's mind and defeat the nightmares within!

CONTENT WARNING

Some light horror / disturbing imagery.

------------------

CONTROLS

Movement - Arrow Keys / D-PAD

Jump - Z / Xbox A

Run - X / Xbox X

Backflip - C or A / Xbox Y or Xbox B

Interact / Enter Doors / Talk to NPCs - Up Key / Up D-PAD

------------------

If you liked the demo, please know that you can follow the progress of the game over at Twitter or Tumblr (@daisytower)!

(DISCLAIMER: This game is based on the Super Mario Bros. franchise, featuring some of its most well-known characters. This game is not made in affiliation with Nintendo nor with their permission. I do not own the rights to the Super Mario Bros. franchise nor it's characters. Please support Nintendo by buying Super Mario Maker 2 or Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury or by watching the upcoming Mario Movie)
